meanings.definition: A person who plays the tambur.
meanings.sent1: The tamburist performed at the cultural festival.
meanings.sent2: The talented tamburist practiced diligently every day.
meanings.sent3: The tamburist's fingers moved swiftly on the strings.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the best tamburist in town.
meanings.sent5: The tamburist's music touched the hearts of all who listened.
